Sloga: Vlast da prekine tabloidni i stranački progon uzbunjivača

03 Nov 2019, 08:25

Udruženi sindikati Srbije "Sloga" pozvali su Vladu Srbije i njene institucije, posebno Ministarstvo unutrašnjih poslova (MUP) i Bezbednosno informativnu agenciju (BIA), da hitno prekinu tabloidni progon svih uzbunjivača u Srbiji, posebno članova i čelnika Sindikata policije "Sloga" koji se javno izjašnjavaju kao uzbunjivači u MUP Srbije.Kada je usvojen Zakon o zaštiti uzbunjivača, vlast ga je punim ustima promovisala navodeći da su uzbunjivači Srbiji potrebni jer štite sistem, naveo je sindikat "Sloga" u saopštenju uz ocenu da je očigledno da je vlast  napravila zakon samo za papir, jer se u on u praksi ne sprovodi."Umesto argumentovanih odgovora na uzbunjivanje javnosti u vezi sa kršenjem zakona i malverzacijama, dobijaju se krajnje neprimereni odgovori preko režimskih tabloida ili u javnim nastupima stranačkih prvaka u kojima se uzbunjivači nazivaju izdajnicima, špijunima, neprijateljima države ili nastranim nakazama, što je apsolutno neprihvatljivo i krajnje ponižavajuće", piše u saopštenju Sloge.Sindikat je dodao da svi koji su režirali tabloidno spinovanje, pisali i sprovodili progon i uništenje poštenih i moralnih ljudi treba da odgovaraju pred zakonom.

Sloga: Authority to interrupt tabloid and party persecution of alarmists

03 Nov 2019, 08:25

Associated Unions of Serbia "Sloga" urged the Government of Serbia and its institutions, especially the Ministry of Internal Affairs (MUP) and the Security Information Agency (BIA), to urgently end the tabloid persecution of all Serbian alerts, especially members and leaders of the Sloga Police Union When they passed the Law on the Protection of Alarms, the government promoted it with a full mouth, stating that it was necessary for Serbia to protect the system because of the protection of the system, said the Sloga union in a statement saying it was obvious that the government had made the law just for the paper, because it is not practiced in practice. "Instead of argumentative responses to public outcry regarding misconduct and malpractice, extremely inappropriate responses are obtained through regime tabloids or in public appearances by party champions in which insurgents are called traitors, spies , enemies of the state, or outrageous freaks, which is absolutely unacceptable and utterly endearing The union added that everyone who directed the tabloid spin, wrote and conducted the persecution and destruction of honest and moral people should be held accountable before the law.
